LogInFieldset.instructions: TO CONFIRM YOU'LL ATTEND, PLEASE FILL IN THE FORM:

parking.label: PARKING
parking.placeholder: WILL YOU NEED A PLACE TO PARK?

songs.label: WEDDING PLAYLIST
songs.placeholder: Let's put together a wedding playlist - from your favorite songs! They don't need to follow any theme or genre. We want to hear what you like! :) <breakingLine><bold>You can add anything from 3 to 10 songs</bold></breakingLine>.

notes.label: NOTES
notes.placeholder: THIS FIELD IS FOR ALL THE NOTES AND QUESTIONS THAT ESCAPED OUR MIND BUT MIGHT BE SETTLED IN YOURS! ALSO FEEL FREE TO LEAVE HERE A RECCOMENDATION FOR A WEDDING PRODUCT/SERVICE YOU HAD A GOOD EXPERIENCE WITH, WE'D  LOVE TO GET INSPIRED. <3
